titles.title: Ethics in Government Act Authorization Extension Act of 1988
Ethics in Government Act Authorization Extension Act of 1988
A bill to amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Office of Government Ethics for six years.

bill.summary: 3/31/1988--Reported to House amended, Part I. (Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 100-558 (Part I)) Ethics in Government Act Authorization Extension Act of 1988 - Amends the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to authorize appropriations of a specified amount for the Office Government Ethics for FY 1989 and such sums as necessary for each of the following five fiscal years.
